pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Flask-Scaffolding-Base- Flask Scaffolding with builtin Authentication & Authorization- Installation : ```pip install flask-scaffolding```- Run to create a new flask app with the given name and destination path.```python -m scaffold.web <YOUR_APP_NAME> <path/to/destination>```- Add your custom model into `<YOUR_APP_NAME>/app/models/`, - Run to add a new screen UI on created app above,```python -m scaffold.ui <MODEL_NAME> <path/to/model/file/location>```
